name: SPILL CONTROL ASSOCIATION OF AMERICA
sampleDescriptions: Merchant Mariner Credential issue related to certain technical personnel aboard spill response vessels during spill incidents.

Exempt back deck spill response workers from CG requirements.
Coast Guard Authorization Act of 2019 (H.R. 3409/S. 2297), related to Merchant Marine Credential for certain non-operational workers aboar
